description: The Platonic essence of ink.  You probably shouldn't have access to this.
A simple ink made by boiling fruit and vinegar together until it becomes thicker and darker.  It won't last through the ages but you can write with it.
A simple ink made by boiling fruit and vinegar with herbs.  It won't hold anything more than a rudimentary enchantment.
An ink made by boiling fruit and vinegar with magical components and herbs.  The additional materials provide extra reservoir for magic, and it can hold a greater enchantment than herbs alone.
An ink made by boiling fruit and vinegar with magical components and herbs.  This ink is strong enough to use for more powerful rituals.
